name: spinupwp
title: SpinupWP
description: Quickly manage your SpinupWP servers and websites.
author: damiengorin

commands.name: spinupwp-dashboard
commands.title: Open Dashboard
commands.subtitle: SpinupWP
commands.description: Open the SpinupWP dashboard in your browser

preferences.name: apiToken
preferences.title: API Token (Default Account)
preferences.description: Default API token. Use SpinupWP Accounts command to manage multiple accounts.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
